game.name: Attrax
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Opposites attract and likes repel. Enter the mysterious world of Attrax in this captivating single-player experience. Solve logic puzzles based on attraction and repulsion, and uncover the origins of the institute. Enjoy hours of gameplay that will redefine your understanding of physics and logic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Opposites attract and likes repel. Enter the mysterious world of Attrax in this captivating single-player experience. Solve logic puzzles based on attraction and repulsion, and uncover the origins of the institute. Enjoy hours of gameplay that will redefine your understanding of physics and logic.
